messages.message: not sure the exact right place to ask, but I noticed that we have some API paths with dashes and some with underscores https://github.com/instabase/instabase/blob/df2ccbdd2752f93d63ad38c7d10da2dd08f35b18/webserver/api-server-apps/src/py/instabase/server/main.py#L157. Which Jira project is hte right one to talk about standardizing on one?
agree that we should standardize this, but it may be difficult if we have customers using these apis
